title: Sony Vegas Pro 12 Essential Training With Steve Grisetti Jul 16,
description:
Sony Vegas Pro 12 Essential Training
With Steve Grisetti
Jul 16, 2013  (4h 33m) 

This course will take a deep look at Sony Vegas Pro 12 from the basics of setting up a project and adding media, to outputting your finished piece. It starts by showing you how to open a project, and how to get your video files from your camcorder or other recording device to your computer. It also looks at how to add video and audio effects, and focuses on effects like color correction and chroma key. And it will look at how to customize these effects for your specific needs and show you how to use the Pan and Crop Motion tool to create motion pans over your photos.
Learning to edit video professionally or to cut your own projects together? Get to know Sony Vegas Pro 12 . In these tutorials, film and television industry veteran Steve Grisetti walks you through the entire Vegas workflow. Learn to import media from a variety of locations; edit clips in the Timeline; edit and enhance audio, including voice-over narration; and add effects to enhance the color, mood, and drama of your movie. You'll also find out how to add titles, apply transitions between scenes, chroma key, add animations such as pans and scrolls, and crop footage for maximum impact.
Topics include:

    Setting up a new Vegas project
    Importing video from a camera
    Managing files in the Project Media panel
    Pre-applying stabilization
    Adding and trimming events on the Timeline
    Editing a multicamera scene
    Adding fade-ins, fade-outs, and cross-fade transitions
    Editing audio
    Using the Chroma Keyer effect
    Adding a rolling or scrolling title
    Creating animated effects
    Outputting your final video
